object.name: Device.LMAP.
object.description: This object represents the objects necessary to manage and control the functionality for Large-Scale Measurement of Broadband Performance{{bibref|RFC7594}} as defined in by {{bibref|LMAPIFM}}.

parameter.name: MeasurementAgentNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: ReportNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: EventNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.
object.description: This object represents the measurement agent that performs measurement tasks and reporting functions defined in {{bibref|RFC7594}}.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object}} instance.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: Version
parameter.description: Version of the measurement agent.

parameter.name: LastStarted
parameter.description: Date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, in UTC that the measurement agent was successfully started.

parameter.name: CapabilityTags
parameter.description: Capabilities of the measurement agent that cannot be expressed elsewhere in the data model.

parameter.name: Identifier
parameter.description: Identifier of the {{object}} instance.

parameter.name: GroupIdentifier
parameter.description: Identifier of the measurement group of interest to which the measurement agent belongs.

parameter.name: MeasurementPoint
parameter.description: Identifier of the measurement point indicating where the measurement agent is located on a path as defined in [bibref|RFC7398}}.

parameter.name: UseAgentIdentifierInReports
parameter.description: If the value of the {{param|Identifier}} parameter is not {{empty}} and the value of this parameter is {{false}} then the value of the {{param|Identifier}} parameter MUST not be included in measurement reports.

parameter.name: UseGroupIdentifierInReports
parameter.description: If the value of the {{param|GroupIdentifier}} parameter is not {{empty}} and the value of this parameter is {{false}} then the value of the {{param|GroupIdentifier}} parameter MUST not be included in measurement reports.

parameter.name: UseMeasurementPointInReports
parameter.description: If the value of the {{param|MeasurementPoint}} parameter is not {{empty}} and the value of this parameter is {{false}} then the value of the {{param|MeasurementPoint}} parameter MUST not be included in measurement reports.

parameter.name: PublicCredential
parameter.description: {{reference|a {{object|##.Security.Certificate}} object that is used to identify this measurement agent}}

parameter.name: PrivateCredential
parameter.description: {{reference|a {{object|##.Security.Certificate}} object that is used to contain the private keys for this measurement agent}}

parameter.name: EventLog
parameter.description: {{reference|a {{object|##.DeviceInfo.VendorLogFile}} object that is used to record events for this measurement agent}}

parameter.name: TaskCapabilityNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: ScheduleNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: TaskNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: CommunicationChannelNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: InstructionNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.TaskCapability.{i}.
object.description: This object represents a capabilities, in the context of a task, that are supported by the measurement agent. Types of capabilities include: Report tasks, Configuration Tasks and Instruction Tasks.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: Name of the supported task.

parameter.name: Version
parameter.description: Version of the task.

parameter.name: TaskCapabilityRegistryNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.TaskCapability.{i}.Registry.{i}.
object.description: This object represents a registry function and an associated list of roles supported by this measurement agent

parameter.name: RegistryEntry
parameter.description: A URI ({{bibref|RFC3986}}) that is the value of the task registry entry as defined in {{bibref|LMAPREG}} or a value for a task that is understood by the measurement agent, measurement controller and measurement collector.

parameter.name: Roles
parameter.description: {{list| representing the roles of the function}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Controller.
object.description: This objects represents the measurement controller that is assigned to a measurement agent.

parameter.name: ControllerTimeout
parameter.description:
The timer, in {{units}}, that is started after each successful contact with a measurement controller.
When the timer reaches the timeout an event is raised indicating that connectivity to the controller has been lost.

parameter.name: ControlSchedules
ControlTasks
ControlChannels
parameter.description:
{{list}} {{reference|a {{object|#.CommunicationChannel}} object}}
The measurement agent to measurement controller channel is used for conveying results of communication sessions with the configuration, instruction status and logging information elements defined in defined in {{bibref|LMAPIFM}}.

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Schedule.{i}.
object.description:
This object represents a schedule that is associated with a set of scheduled actions to be performed by a measurement agent.
Note: Actions of an occurrence of this {{object}} are gracefully terminated by the defining either the {{param|End}} or {{param|Duration}} parameters. Only one of these parameters may be defined at a time.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object}} instance.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: Name of the schedule.

parameter.name: State
parameter.description:
The current operational state of the Schedule. Only one instance of the schedule is active. An active schedule is defined where the {{param}} parameter has a value of {{enum|Running|State}}.
{{enum}}

parameter.name: Start
parameter.description: {{reference|a {{object|##.Event}} object that is used define the event to start an occurrence of this {{object}}}}

parameter.name: End
parameter.description: {{reference|a {{object|##.Event}} object that is used define the event to gracefully terminate all actions associated with an occurrence of this {{object}}}}.

parameter.name: Duration
parameter.description: When the {{param}} value is not 0, this parameter is used define the duration, in {{units}}, where after this duration all actions associated with an occurrence of this {{object}} are gracefully terminated.

parameter.name: Tags
parameter.description: {{list|each entry represents tags that are to be reported together with the measurement results.}}

parameter.name: SuppressionTags
parameter.description: {{list|representing the suppression tags to be matched}}

parameter.name: ExecutionMode

enumeration.description:
Actions are executed in sequence as defined by the value of the {{param|Action.{i}.Order}} parameter.
The first Scheduled Action of the DestinationOutput is provided the input.

Actions are executed in parallel.
The all Scheduled Actions of the DestinationOutput are provided the input.

Actions are executed in sequence where the output of one Action is used as the input of subsequent Action.
The first Scheduled Action of the DestinationOutput is provided the input.

parameter.name: LastInvocation
parameter.description: Date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, in UTC that the {{object}} was invoked by the measurement agent.

parameter.name: Storage
parameter.description:
The amount of secondary storage, in {{units}}, allocated to an instance of this {{object}}.
The value of this parameter reflects the amount of allocated physical storage and not the storage used by logical data records.
For example the secondary storage can be the storage allocated in a file system holding temporary data.

parameter.name: ActionNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Schedule.{i}.Stats.
object.description: This object represents the statistics associated with this object.

parameter.name: Invocations
parameter.description: Number of invocations of this schedule. This counter does not include suppressed invocations or invocations that were prevented due to an overlap with a previous invocation of this schedule.

parameter.name: Suppressions
parameter.description: Number of suppressed executions of this schedule.

parameter.name: Overlaps
parameter.description: Number of executions prevented due to overlaps with a previous invocation of this schedule.

parameter.name: Failures
parameter.description: Number of failed executions of this schedule. A failed execution is an execution where at least one action failed.

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Schedule.{i}.Action.{i}.
object.description: This object represents an action that is associated with the this {{object|##.Schedule}} object.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object|##.Schedule.{i}.Action}} object.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: State
parameter.description: The current operational state of the {{object}}. {{enum}}

parameter.name: Order
parameter.description: The order of the scheduled action.

parameter.name: Task
parameter.description: {{reference|a {{object|##.Task}} object used in this scheduled action}}

parameter.name: OutputDestination
parameter.description: {{list}} {{reference|a {{object|##.Schedule}} object used to receive the output(s) of this scheduled action}}

parameter.name: SuppressionTags
parameter.description: {{list|representing the suppression tags to be matched}}

parameter.name: Tags
parameter.description: {{list|each entry represents tags that are to be reported together with the measurement results.}}

parameter.name: Storage
parameter.description:
The amount of secondary storage, in {{units}}, allocated to an instance of this {{object}}.
The value of this parameter reflects the amount of allocated physical storage and not the storage used by logical data records.
For example the secondary storage can be the storage allocated in a file system holding temporary data.

parameter.name: LastInvocation
parameter.description: Date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, in UTC that the {{object}} was invoked by the measurement agent.

parameter.name: LastSuccessfulCompletion
parameter.description: Date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, in UTC of a successful completion of the {{object}}.

parameter.name: LastSuccessfulStatusCode
parameter.description: The status code returned by successful execution of the {{object}}. A value of 0 indicates successful completion.

parameter.name: LastSuccessfulMessage
parameter.description: The message associated with the successful completion of the {{object}}.

parameter.name: LastFailedCompletion
parameter.description: Date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, in UTC of a failure to complete the {{object}}.

parameter.name: LastFailedStatusCode
parameter.description: The status code returned by failed execution of the {{object}}. A value of 0 indicates successful completion.

parameter.name: LastFailedMessage
parameter.description: The message associated with the failure to complete the task.

parameter.name: OptionNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Schedule.{i}.Action.{i}.Stats.
object.description: This object represents the statistics associated with this object.

parameter.name: Invocations
parameter.description: Number of invocations of this action. This counter does not include suppressed invocations or invocations that were prevented due to an overlap with a previous invocation of this schedule.

parameter.name: Suppressions
parameter.description: Number of suppressed executions of this action.

parameter.name: Overlaps
parameter.description: Number of executions prevented due to overlaps with a previous invocation of this action.

parameter.name: Failures
parameter.description: Number of failed executions of this action. A failed execution is an execution where at least one action failed.

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Schedule.{i}.Action.{i}.Option.{i}.
object.description: This object represents an option associated with the Scheduled Action. When an option with the same Name exists between the Seheduled Action's Option and The Task's option, the option of the Scheduled Action takes precedence over the option associated with the Task.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object}} instance.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: Order
parameter.description: The order of the Option.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description:
The name of the option.
When the value of this parameter is equal to "channel", the option value specifies the Communication Channel used for this scheduled task.

parameter.name: Value
parameter.description: The value associated with the Option.

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Task.{i}.
object.description:
The {{object}} object defines the configuration for a task that can be performed by {{object|##.MeasurementAgent}} objects.
Tasks are performed by {{object|##.MeasurementAgent}} objects when a {{object|#.Schedule}} object invokes the Task.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object}} instance.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: Name of the task.

parameter.name: Tags
parameter.description: {{list|each entry represents tags that are to be reported together with the measurement results.}}

parameter.name: OptionNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: RegistryNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Task.{i}.Registry.{i}.
object.description: This object represents a registry function and an associated list of roles for this task

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object}} instance.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: RegistryEntry
parameter.description: A URI ({{bibref|RFC3986}}) that is the value of the task registry entry as defined in {{bibref|LMAPREG}} or a value for a task that is understood by the measurement agent, measurement controller and measurement collector.

parameter.name: Roles
parameter.description: {{list| representing the roles of the function}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Task.{i}.Option.{i}.
object.description: This object represents an option associated with the task.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object}} instance.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: Order
parameter.description: The order of the Option.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description:
The name of the option.
When the value of this parameter is equal to "channel", the option value specifies the Communication Channel used for this task.

parameter.name: Value
parameter.description: The value associated with the Option.

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.CommunicationChannel.{i}.
object.description:
This object represents the properties communication channel used to establish communication between a measurement agent and other elements of the LMAP framework (e.g., measurement controller, measurement collector). The value of the {{param|Name}} parameter used for conveying information is defined as an option in the Task's or scheduled Task's option parameter.
When this object uses the BulkData capability, a {{object|###.BulkData.Profile.{i}}} object instance referred to by this object.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object}} instance.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: Name of the channel.

parameter.name: UseBulkDataProfile
parameter.description: Enables or disables the ability to use a bulk data profile for this communication channel

parameter.name: BulkDataProfile
parameter.description: {{reference|a {{object|###.BulkData.Profile}} object that is used to represent communication channel}}

parameter.name: Target
parameter.description: The {{datatype}} of the LMAP component that is the target of this communication channel.

parameter.name: TargetPublicCredential
parameter.description: {{reference|a {{object|###.Security.Certificate}} object that is used to identify the target of this channel}}

parameter.name: Interface
parameter.description: {{reference|an interface object used to restrict the data transmitted or received using this channel to a specific interface}} If the value of this parameter is {{empty}} the data that is transmitted or received using this channel is able to use any available interface.

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Instruction.{i}.
object.description: The {{object}} object defines the instruction to the measurement agent by the measurement controller. At most one {{object}} object for the {{object|##.MeasurementAgent}} instance is enabled at a time. .

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object}} instance.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: LastChange
parameter.description: Date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, in UTC that the {{object}} object or its sub-object's configuration was changed by a measurement agent's controller.

parameter.name: InstructionSchedules
InstructionTasks
ReportChannels
MeasurementSuppressionNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Instruction.{i}.MeasurementSuppression.{i}.
object.description: This object defines the schedules and actions that are suppressed based on criteria defined in the {{param|SuppressionMatch}} parameter.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object}} instance.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: Name of the suppression object.

parameter.name: State
parameter.description: The current operational state of the {{object}}. {{enum}}

parameter.name: StopRunning
parameter.description: When {{true}}, the measurement agent is instructed to stop running schedules or actions that have been matched by this object.

parameter.name: Start
End
parameter.description: {{reference|a {{object|###.Event}} object that is used define the event to gracefully suspend all actions associated with an occurrence of this {{object}}}} When {{empty}} the default behavior is for the suspension period to be indefinite.

parameter.name: SuppressionMatch
parameter.description: {{list|representing the match patterns to be used for applying suppression to {{object|##.Schedule.{i}}} (and their actions) and all {{object|##.Schedule.{i}.Action.{i}}} object instances that have a matched using their SuppressionTags parameters}} The match pattern syntax is defined in {{bibref|LMAPIFM}}.

object.name: Device.LMAP.Report.{i}.
object.description:
This {{object}} object instance represents a report that is generated by a reporting task where the reporting task is defined as a {{object|#.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Task.{i}}} and executed as a scheduled action ({{object|#.MeasurementAgent.{i}.Schedule.{i}.Action.{i}}}).
The {{object}} replicates the {{object|#.MeasurementAgent.{i}}} object instance's data at the time of the action execution.
When a {{object|##.BulkData.Profile.{i}}} object instance is used to communicate a {{object}} instance, the CPE adds a {{object|##.BulkData.Profile.{i}.Parameter.{i}}} object instance referring to this {{object}} object instance.

parameter.name: ReportDate
parameter.description: The report date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, that the report was sent to the collector.

parameter.name: AgentIdentifier
parameter.description: Identifier of the measurement agent at the time the measurement was run.

parameter.name: GroupIdentifier
parameter.description: Identifier of the measurement group of interest to which the MA belongs.

parameter.name: MeasurementPoint
parameter.description: Identifier of the measurement point indicating where the measurement agent is located on a path as defined in {{bibref|RFC7398}}.

parameter.name: ResultNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.Report.{i}.Result.{i}.
object.description: The {{object}} object provides the meta-data of the result report of a single executed action that produced the result.

parameter.name: TaskName
parameter.description: Name of the task that produced the result.

parameter.name: ScheduleName
parameter.description: Name of the schedule that produced the result.

parameter.name: ActionName
parameter.description: Name of the action that produced the result.

parameter.name: EventTime
parameter.description: The date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, that the event that triggered the schedule of the action that produced the reported result values in UTC.

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: The date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, that the action started in UTC.

parameter.name: EndTime
parameter.description: The date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, that the action was completed in UTC.

parameter.name: CycleNumber
parameter.description:
The cycle number derived from the {{param|EventTime}}.
The cycle number is the time, in UTC, closest to the {{param|EventTime}} that is a multiple of the cycle interval of the event that triggered the execution of the schedule.
The value is valid if the event that triggered the execution of the schedule has a defined cycle interval. {{empty}} represents an invalid CycleNumber.
{{pattern}}

parameter.name: Status
parameter.description: The status code returned by the execution of the action.

parameter.name: Tags
parameter.description: {{list|each entry represents tags defined for the schedule, task and action objects that produced this result}}

parameter.name: OptionNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: ResultConflictNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: ResultReportTableNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.Report.{i}.Result.{i}.Option.{i}.
object.description: This object represents an option associated with the task or action object that produced the result.

parameter.name: Order
parameter.description: The order of the Option.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description:
The name of the Option.
When the value of this parameter is equal to "channel", the option value specifies the Communication Channel used for this task.

parameter.name: Value
parameter.description: The value associated with the Option.

object.name: Device.LMAP.Report.{i}.Result.{i}.Conflict.{i}.
object.description: This object represents actions that might have impacted the results being reported.

parameter.name: TaskName
parameter.description: Name of the task.

parameter.name: ScheduleName
parameter.description: Name of the schedule.

parameter.name: ActionName
parameter.description: Name of the action.

object.name: Device.LMAP.Report.{i}.Result.{i}.ReportTable.{i}.
object.description: This {{object}} object instances represents a row of results.

parameter.name: ColumnLabels
parameter.description:
{{list}} This parameter contains the column labels used for the result.
The column labels are ordered with the corresponding entries in the {{object|ResultRow}} table.

parameter.name: ResultReportRowNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

parameter.name: RegistryNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.Report.{i}.Result.{i}.ReportTable.{i}.ResultRow.{i}.
object.description: This {{object}} object instances represents a row of results for the report.

parameter.name: Values
parameter.description: {{list}} This parameter contains an ordered set of values that align to the columns defined in the {{param|#.ColumnLabels}} parameter.

object.name: Device.LMAP.Report.{i}.Result.{i}.ReportTable.{i}.Registry.{i}.
object.description: This object represents a registry function and an associated list of roles for this result report.

parameter.name: RegistryEntry
parameter.description: A URI ({{bibref|RFC3986}}) that is the value of the registry entry as defined in {{bibref|LMAPREG}} or a value for a task that is understood by the measurement agent, measurement controller and measurement collector.

parameter.name: Roles
parameter.description: {{list| representing the roles of the function}}

object.name: Device.LMAP.Event.{i}.
object.description: This object defines the information associated with an event used within the measurement agent. Event instances may be referenced by various objects within the LMAP model.

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description:
Enables or disables this {{object}} instance.
This parameter is based on ''ifAdminStatus'' from {{bibref|RFC2863}}.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: Name of the Event.

parameter.name: Type
parameter.description:
This parameter describes the type of {{object}} for this object instance. The timing of the event occurrence is adjusted based on the value of the {{param|RandomnessSpread}} parameter.
{{enum}}

enumeration.description: Periodic Timing Event. When selected one or more event occurrences are emitted based on the parameters defined in the {{object|PeriodicTimer}} object.
Calendar Timing Event. When selected one or more event occurrences are emitted based on the parameters defined in the {{object|CalendarTimer}} object.
One-off Timing Event. When selected a single event occurrence is emitted based on the parameters defined in the {{object|OneOff}} object.
Immediate Timing Event. When selected a single event occurrence is emitted as soon as possible.
Startup Timing Event. When selected a single event occurrence is emitted when the corresponding measurement agent starts up.
Controller Lost Event. When selected a single event occurrence is emitted when the connectivity to the controller is lost.
Controller Connected Event. When selected a single event occurrence is emitted when the connectivity to the controller is established.

parameter.name: RandomnessSpread
parameter.description: The spread, in {{units}}, of the Uniform Discrete random distribution algorithm. A value of 0 means that the random algorithm is not applied.

parameter.name: CycleInterval
parameter.description: The duration of the time interval, in {{units}}, that used to calculate cycle numbers.

object.name: Device.LMAP.Event.{i}.PeriodicTimer.
object.description: This object defines a periodic timer instance. The periodic timer instance has attributes for when the timer is to begin ({{param|StartTime}}) and end ({{param|EndTime}}) as well as the interval to use.

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: Date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, that the {{object}} instance is to begin operation.

parameter.name: EndTime
parameter.description: Date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, that the {{object}} instance is to end operation.

parameter.name: Interval
parameter.description: The tolerable duration, in {{units}}, of the interval for this {{object}} instance.

object.name: Device.LMAP.Event.{i}.CalendarTimer.
object.description:
This object defines a calendar timer instance.
The calendar timer instance has attributes for when the timer is to begin ({{param|StartTime}}) and end ({{param|EndTime}}) as well as the schedule of the recurrence.
The algrorithm that defines how the schedule elements are evaluated is defined in {{bibref|LMAPIFM}}.
If the value of any of the {{param|ScheduleMonths}}, {{param|ScheduleDaysOfMonth}}, {{param|ScheduleDaysOfWeek}}, {{param|ScheduleHoursOfDay}}, {{param|ScheduleMinutesOfHour}} or {{param|ScheduleSecondsOfMinute}} is {{empty}} then any actions that use this object will not be invoked.

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: Date and time that the {{object}} instance is to begin this operation.

parameter.name: EndTime
parameter.description: Date and time that the {{object}} instance is to end this operation.

parameter.name: ScheduleMonths
parameter.description:
This parameter represents either a list of the months of year that are applied to the schedule or an asterisk (*) that represents all the elements of the list.
Each entry in the months of the year list can be a numeric value or the name of the month (january (1), february (2), march (3), april (4), may (5), june (6), july (7), august (8), september (9), october (10), november (11), december (12)).

parameter.name: ScheduleDaysOfMonth
parameter.description: This parameter represents either a list of the days of the month (1-31) that are applied to the schedule or an asterisk (*) that represents all the elements of the list.

parameter.name: ScheduleDaysOfWeek
parameter.description:
This parameter represents either a list of the days of the week that are applied to the schedule or an asterisk (*) that represents all the elements of the list.
Each entry in the days of the week list can be a numeric value or the name of the day (sunday (1), monday (2), tuesday (3), wednesday (4), thursday (5), friday (6), saturday (7)).

parameter.name: ScheduleHoursOfDay
parameter.description: This parameter represents either a list of the hours of the day (0-23) that are applied to the schedule or an asterisk (*) that represents all the elements of the list.

parameter.name: ScheduleMinutesOfHour
parameter.description: This parameter represents either a list of the minutes of the hour (0-59) that are applied to the schedule or an asterisk (*) that represents all the elements of the list.

parameter.name: ScheduleSecondsOfMinute
parameter.description: This parameter represents either a list of the minutes of the hour (0-59) that are applied to the schedule or an asterisk (*) that represents all the elements of the list.

parameter.name: EnableScheduleTimezoneOffset
parameter.description:
When {{true}}, the value of the {{param|ScheduleTimezoneOffset}} parameter is applied to the schedule elements.
When {{false}}, the device's system timezone offset is applied to the schedule elements.

parameter.name: ScheduleTimezoneOffset
parameter.description: The timezone offset, in {{units}}, to be applied to the schedule elements.

object.name: Device.LMAP.Event.{i}.OneOff.
object.description: This object defines a one off timer instance.

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: Date and time, based on {{bibref|RFC3339}}, that the {{object}} instance is to begin operation.
